scripts.build: pnpm --filter codeskins-backend build && pnpm --filter codeskins-frontend build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter codeskins-backend test && pnpm --filter codeskins-frontend test
scripts.test:coverage: pnpm --filter codeskins-backend test:coverage && pnpm --filter codeskins-frontend test:coverage
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter codeskins-backend lint && pnpm --filter codeskins-frontend lint
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter codeskins-backend type-check && pnpm --filter codeskins-frontend type-check
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules shared/node_modules frontend/.next backend/dist
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && pnpm --filter codeskins-frontend install && pnpm --filter codeskins-backend install && pnpm --filter shared install
